participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and resilient, with a love for reading and a passion for the thrilling aspects of life.
participant_1.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household. i read twenty books a year. i am a stunt double as my second job.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, with a deep love for culinary arts and a fascination with history.
participant_2.background: i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year. i am an art major in college. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.
